Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a light-brown pottery vessel, the interior is slightly grooved, the exterior is covered with a light-brown slip, faint traces of a black-painted text have been obscured by salt action.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393243) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393243)
